applet=SimpleKDL.jar

application.macosx=SimpleKDL.jar,libSimpleKDL.jnilib
application.windows32=SimpleKDL.jar,SimpleKDL32.dll
application.windows64=SimpleKDL.jar,SimpleKDL64.dll
application.linux32=SimpleKDL.jar,libSimpleKDL32.so,./lib32/*
application.linux64=SimpleKDL.jar,libSimpleKDL64.so,./lib64/liborocos-kdl.so
